params.text: Enjuki entono ebuze. Mwami Njovu asobola okuyamba?
Obeera mu kisu?
Nedda, ekinyonyi kye kibeera mu kisu.
Obeera mu mpuku?
Nedda, akawundo ke kabeera mu’mpuku.
Obeera mu kiyumba ky’enjuki?
Yee, ekiyumba kino ge maka gange.
Webale kunnyamba, Mwami Njovu.
Enjuki n’enjovu ba mukwano.

"Enjuki n’enjovu" credits

This work, "Enjuki n’enjovu", is a derivative of "The bee and the elephant" translated by Celia Bolam used under CC BY.  It is based on the Original story: 'ឃ្មុំនិងដំរី', by Long Ravy © Room to Read, 2015. 

Some changes were made to this work. "Enjuki n’enjovu" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
